attributes.description:
2016 Mitsubishi ASX 2.0 MPi Sport GLX manual for sale.
Standard Features: Panoramic Sunroof | Rockford Fosgate audio system | key-less entry with push button start | tow-bar | rear park distance control (PDC) | black leather interior | cruise-control | auto headlights and rain sensing wipers | electric fold-in side mirrors | multi-function steering-wheel | air-bags | ABS brakes | air-con | fog-lamps and so much more...

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.
Visit Our Web Page For All Our Stock.

Mitsubishi ASX 2.0 MPi Sport GLX
Power - 110 kW @ 6000 rpm
Torque - 197 Nm @ 4200 rpm
Economy - 7.5 l/100km
Gears - 5 / FRONT
Acceleration - 9.5 seconds
Top Speed - 194 km/h
Airbags (total) - 7
Length - 4,295 mm
Seats - 5
Boot Capacity - 442 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
